title: Civilians 'killed in Syria by Russia and U.S. air strikes'
text:
Civilians 'killed in Syria by Russia and U.S. air strikes' Tuesday, March 06, 2018 - 01:19 
Air strikes by Russia and a U.S.-led coalition killed civilians in Syria on a large scale last year, while the Assad government carried out unlawful chemical weapon attacks in rebel-held eastern Ghouta, U.N. war crimes investigators said on Tuesday.   
Air strikes by Russia and a U.S.-led coalition killed civilians in Syria on a large scale last year, while the Assad government carried out unlawful chemical weapon attacks in rebel-held eastern Ghouta, U.N. war crimes investigators said on Tuesday.  //reut.rs/2oRIDDY
